text: Hartmut Nickel (16 November 1944 – 27 June 2019) was a German ice hockey player. He played for SC Dynamo Berlin from 1963 to 1974. He competed for the East Germany national team at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble. Nickel was born in Weißwasser, Saxony. He died on 27 June 2019, at the age of 74. ==References== ==Other websites== *Hartmut Nickel at the International Olympic Committee Category:1944 births Category:2019 deaths Category:1968 Winter Olympics Category:German ice hockey players Category:Olympians for East Germany Category:Sportspeople from Saxony
title: Hartmut Nickel
